scenes.description: Yuzuki Choco performing 'Black Cherry' on stage.
Yuzuki Choco and Roboco-san performing 'Hitorigoto' on stage.

subtitles.original: ...down
subtitles.english: ...down

subtitles.original: Black Cherry 濡れて 落ちて 私の中へ
subtitles.english: Black Cherry, getting wet, falling into me

subtitles.original: 種を残して yeah
subtitles.english: Leaving your seed, yeah

subtitles.original: 愛さなくていいよ 愛せないから
subtitles.english: You don't have to love me, because you can't

subtitles.original: こんなに惨めにして yeah
subtitles.english: Make me miserable like this, yeah

subtitles.original: 禁断の手口 ずっと抜け出せなくなって
subtitles.english: A forbidden trick, I can't escape it anymore

subtitles.original: 感じる Black Cherry キスの感触 ちょっと忘れられない
subtitles.english: I feel the Black Cherry, the feel of your kiss, I can't quite forget it

subtitles.original: Don't stop kiss me 離れられない
subtitles.english: Don't stop kiss me, I can't leave you

subtitles.original: Don't stop kiss me でも許せない
subtitles.english: Don't stop kiss me, but I can't forgive you

subtitles.original: 中に出して
subtitles.english: Put it inside

subtitles.original: Black Cherry 濡れて 落ちて 私の中へ
subtitles.english: Black Cherry, getting wet, falling into me

subtitles.original: 種を残して yeah
subtitles.english: Leaving your seed, yeah

subtitles.original: 愛さなくていいよ 愛せないから
subtitles.english: You don't have to love me, because you can't

subtitles.original: こんなに惨めにして yeah
subtitles.english: Make me miserable like this, yeah

subtitles.original: Black Cherry 頂戴 Black Cherry もっと
subtitles.english: Give me Black Cherry, Black Cherry, more

subtitles.original: 本当はずっと 愛してたのに
subtitles.english: Even though I had actually loved you all along

subtitles.original: 短いヒストリー ちょっとした寄り道なの
subtitles.english: A short history, just a little detour

subtitles.original: これでバイバイ
subtitles.english: This is goodbye

subtitles.original: 消えるたまには こんな私のこと思い出して
subtitles.english: Fade away, once in a while, please remember me

subtitles.original: ひとりごとだよ
subtitles.english: It's just a monologue

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしいこと聞かないでよね
subtitles.english: Don't ask about embarrassing things

subtitles.original: キミのことだよ
subtitles.english: It's about you

subtitles.original: でもその先は言わないけどね
subtitles.english: But I won't say any more than that

subtitles.original: ヒトリゴト 作詞：ケリー 作曲：神前 暁 編曲：高橋 浩一郎
subtitles.english: Hitorigoto Lyrics: Kelly Composition: Satoru Kosaki Arrangement: Koichiro Takahashi

subtitles.original: 掛け違えてる ボタンみたいな もどかしさを
subtitles.english: Like buttons fastened incorrectly, this frustration...

subtitles.original: ほどけないまま また難しくしようとしてる
subtitles.english: Remaining untied, I'm trying to make it difficult again

subtitles.original: 伝えたい気持ちは今日も 言葉になる直前に
subtitles.english: The feelings I want to convey, today too, right before they become words...

subtitles.original: 変換ミスの連続で ため息と一緒に飲み込んだら
subtitles.english: In a series of conversion errors, if I swallow them with a sigh...

subtitles.original: ほろ苦い...
subtitles.english: It's bittersweet...

subtitles.original: ふとした瞬間に探しているよ
subtitles.english: In a casual moment, I'm looking for you

subtitles.original: キミの笑顔を探しているよ
subtitles.english: I'm looking for your smile

subtitles.original: 無意識の中 その理由は まだ言えないけど
subtitles.english: In my subconscious, the reason for that, I can't say it yet

subtitles.original: 一人でいると会いたくなるよ
subtitles.english: When I'm alone, I miss you

subtitles.original: 誰といたって会いたくなるよ
subtitles.english: No matter who I'm with, I miss you

subtitles.original: たった一言 ねえ、どうしても...
subtitles.english: Just one word, hey, no matter what...

subtitles.original: 言えないその言葉
subtitles.english: I can't say those words

subtitles.original: 言えないこの気持ち...
subtitles.english: I can't say these feelings...

subtitles.original: 早く気づいてほしいのに
subtitles.english: Even though I want you to notice soon

subtitles.original: 1000ピースあるパズルみたいな選択肢と
subtitles.english: With options like a 1,000-piece puzzle

subtitles.original: 想像力が判断力の邪魔をしちゃう
subtitles.english: Imagination gets in the way of judgment

subtitles.original: 掴めない気持ちは今日も 可愛くない顔見せて
subtitles.english: These elusive feelings, today too, show an uncute face

subtitles.original: 自己嫌悪プラス後悔で 溜め込んだ「ごめんね」を吐き出すには
subtitles.english: With self-loathing plus regret, to spit out the 'sorry' I've bottled up...

subtitles.original: ほど遠い...
subtitles.english: It's far from it...

subtitles.original: 耳を澄ませば聞こえてくるよ
subtitles.english: If I listen closely, I can hear it

subtitles.original: キミの声だけ聞こえてくるよ
subtitles.english: I can hear only your voice

subtitles.original: 雑踏の中 気づかないふり しているけど
subtitles.english: In the bustle, I'm pretending not to notice, but...

subtitles.original: 隣にいると嬉しくなるよ
subtitles.english: When you're next to me, I get happy

subtitles.original: 遠くにいると寂しくなるよ
subtitles.english: When you're far away, I get lonely

subtitles.original: 単純なこと でもどうしても...
subtitles.english: It's simple, but no matter what...

subtitles.original: 言えないその言葉
subtitles.english: I can't say those words

subtitles.original: 言えないこの気持ち...
subtitles.english: I can't say these feelings...

subtitles.original: もっと素直に...
subtitles.english: Be more honest...
